title: The Reunion
occurrences: I think we should thank the three guys who made this reunion happen.
Yes, it's about a class reunion.
I'm calling because I've made a film about a class reunion.
What I'm wondering is why you didn't come to the reunion. It would've been...
Because I didn't know there was a reunion.
- I didn't even want to go to the reunion. - No, me either.
You weren't at the latest reunion. Was that a deliberate decision?
- If you'd invited me to the reunion... - I did! Really, I did!
that at the reunion people were asking, "Where's Anna?"
Andreas and Linda arranged the reunion, not me.
Of course I invited everyone to a reunion!
- I wouldn't do it. - What about the reunion? You didn't...
Weren't you in Anna Odell's class reunion film?
